pageContext.claim: “You were below 2 — you had the slowest recovery in history.  Slowest recovery in history.  And if you take a look at the average [GDP], I think it was 1.7 or 1.8 for eight years.”
pageContext.analysis: Quarterly GDP growth topped 3 percent often in Barack Obama's presidency, mostly recently 2015. Over eight years, Obama averaged 2.2 percent GDP growth which is on par with historic trends. Trump is ignoring that the recession was the worst economic decline since World War II. Plus it was based in the financial sector which generally takes longer to recover.
